operas.orchestra: Orchestra Del Teatro Dell'Opera Di Roma

lyrics.translation: Turandot, the Pure, will be the bride
of the man, of royal blood,
To the palace! To the palace!
Who can help me lift him up?
Oh, father, yes, I’ve found you!
Look at me! It’s not a dream!
Why are you striking us? Alas!
And may my grief itself be blessed,

lyrics.text: per questa gioia che ci dona

lyrics.translation: and I thought you were dead!
now I kiss these sainted hands!...

lyrics.text: vecchio Re senza regno e fuggente
lyrics.translation: an old King without realm, fleeing,
“Come with me, I’ll be your guide...”

lyrics.text: E perché tanta angoscia hai diviso?
lyrics.translation: Why did you share such anguish?
Grind the whetstone! Grind it! etc.
Work is never dull for us

lyrics.text: Con gli uncini e coi coltelli
lyrics.translation: With our hooks and our knives,

lyrics.text: il tuo funereo lume i cimiteri!

lyrics.translation: is spreading out in the sky
From the desert to the sea,
can’t you hear a thousand voices

lyrics.text: Ch’io ti veda e ch’io ti maledica!
lyrics.translation: Let me see you, and curse you!
Princess, have pity on him! etc.

lyrics.text: Principessa! Pietà di lui! La grazia! ecc.
lyrics.translation: Princess! Have pity on him! Have mercy! etc.
My son, what are you doing?
Her perfume is in the air!
No! No! Let me clasp you!
Do you want to die thus?
Do you want to end thus?
Wait! What are you doing? Stop!

lyrics.text: Chi sei? Che fai? Che vuoi?
lyrics.translation: Who are you? What are you doing? What do you want?

lyrics.text: Va’ via! Va’, la porta è questa
lyrics.translation: Go away! Go! This is the door
They knife you and pollard you!
Saw you up and disembowel you!

lyrics.text: Ma qui no, ma qui no!
Qui tutti i cimiteri sono occupati!

lyrics.translation: Our local madmen are quite enough!
We don’t want any more foreign madmen!

lyrics.text: O scappi, o il funeral per te s’appressa!
lyrics.translation: Run off, or else your funeral will be prepared for you!

lyrics.text: Una femmina colla corona in testa!
lyrics.translation: A female with a crown on her head!
And a cloak with some fringe!
But if you strip her naked –

lyrics.text: È roba che non si mangia!
O prendi cento spose, ché, in fondo
lyrics.translation: Or else take a hundred wives, after all
in the world has a face,

lyrics.text: due braccia, e due gambe, sì
lyrics.translation: two arms and two legs, yes,
With a hundred wives, you fool,
you’ll have a surplus of legs!
In a hundred beds! Ha! ha!

lyrics.text: Pazzo, va’ via! va’ via! ecc.

lyrics.translation: Silence! This is the sweet hour
The darkness breathes forth her fragrance!
The darkness breathes forth her fragrance!
He’s not listening to them, alas!
Come! Let’s all three speak to him!
A night without a bit of light...

lyrics.text: Varca i monti, taglia i flutti!
lyrics.translation: Scale the mountains, ford the streams!
If you call, she’ll appear – she
who makes us dream, though we are dead!
I love her! I love her!
No! I, only I love her!
That’s how the moon will kiss

lyrics.text: O figlio, vuoi dunque ch’io solo
lyrics.translation: Oh, son, do you want me then
to drag along through the world
my tortured old age, all alone?
Help! Isn’t there any human voice

lyrics.text: che muova il tuo cuore feroce?
lyrics.translation: that can move your fierce heart?
Liù can bear it no more!
Alas, how long have I travelled
with your name in my soul,
we’ll die on the road to exile!
And I...the shadow of a smile!
Liù can bear it no more!
listen to me: your master tomorrow

lyrics.text: sarà domani forse solo al mondo...
lyrics.translation: will be perhaps alone in the world...
We’ll die on the road to exile!

lyrics.text: Dell’esilio addolcisci a lui le strade!
lyrics.translation: Soften for him the road to exile!

lyrics.text: Questo, questo, o mia povera Liù
lyrics.translation: O my poor Liù, this, this

lyrics.text: al tuo piccolo cuore che non cade
lyrics.translation: is what he who smiles no more

lyrics.text: chiede colui che non sorride più...
Abbi di me, di me pietà!
lyrics.translation: Have pity, have pity on me!
I can’t tear myself from you!
I don’t want to tear myself from you!

lyrics.text: Pietà! Mi getto ai tuoi piedi
lyrics.translation: Pity! I throw myself at your feet,
I’m the one who asks for pity!
I can’t listen to anyone any more!

lyrics.text: Io  vedo il suo fulgido volto!

lyrics.translation: I see her! She calls me!

lyrics.text: come colui che non sorride più!
lyrics.translation: as one who smiles no more!

lyrics.text: ogni senso è un martirio feroce!
lyrics.translation: My senses are all fierce torture!

lyrics.text: Tu passi su un povero cuore
lyrics.translation: You’re treading on a poor heart
that bleeds for you in vain!
The sword has struck them all!
I throw myself at your feet!
Ah, have pity, pity on us!

lyrics.text: Se questo suo strazio non basta
lyrics.translation: As if your torment weren’t enough,

lyrics.text: signore, noi siamo perduti! Con te!
lyrics.translation: lord, we are lost! With you!

lyrics.text: La morte! la morte! la morte!
Il volto che vedi è illusione!
lyrics.translation: The face you see is an illusion!

lyrics.text: La luce che splende è funesta!
lyrics.translation: The light that shines is fatal!

lyrics.text: Tu giochi la testa: La morte!
La morte! la morte! la morte!
La fossa già scaviam per te
in sanscrito, in cinese, in lingua mongola!
